title: Personal eClaim - Automated Claims
summary: Reimagined claim intake with clearer IA, inline validation, and status visibility.
impact: Defect rate reduced by 20 percent post launch

body.raw:
## Context
Claims were slow to triage and visibility was poor.
## Process
Research, IA, wireframes, high fidelity UI, tokens, handoff.
## Outcome
Shorter cycle times and higher satisfaction.
